episodes.title: Special | The Play's The Thing
episodes.summary:
Today we are dropping a special episode introducing you to The Play's The Thing brought to us by L.A. Theatre Work.  They will bring you contemporary, edgy stories from leading writers, starring name actors from stage and screen week by week. If you like their first play, Becky Shaw, you can listen to the whole story on their feed now!

Subscribe to The Play's The Thing so you never miss a story: smarturl.it/play

episodes.title: The Gift Of Listening: A Holiday Special
episodes.summary:
Why do we listen? If you ever wondered why you're so drawn to podcasts, this Holiday Special is just for you. Terms creator Lindsay Graham is joined by the hosts of 15 other podcasts to talk about the gift and the power of listening. The world needs a lot more of it, that's for sure.

Be the first to get the next Gift: 
Smarturl.it/giftoflistening

In the New Year, resolve to listen with a special offer from our sponsor:
Audible.com/Wondery
